content: DD-SW-M Sealing washer Sealing for the DD-WC-SM water dam for core bit diameters from 24 mm (15/16) to 162 mm (6-3/8) ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Drill stand mounted water collectors- - ### FEATURES:Features Makes cleanup of water after coring faster and easier Helps to maintain the water-tightness of the DD-WC-M water dam Applications Wet diamond coring Water management while diamond coring ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Sealing washers For use with: DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA Technical Data | Accessory type | Sealing washers | For use with | DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA ### ITEMS- 207318 - Water seal DD-SW 2 to 2-1/4 M - Package Size 1 pc - 207319 - Water seal DD-SW 2-1/2 to 2 3/4 M - Package Size 1 pc - 207321 - Water seal DD-SW 4 M - Package Size 1 pc - 207324 - Water seal DD-SW 6 M - Package Size 1 pc
